item.title: Dams and Sustainability in China
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j_v3c_tQg0I Dams, dams, and more dams! China is home to roughly half the world’s large dams, and hydropower is set to play a key role in helping China meet its 2020 carb…
